#### Table S2. Summary of features for RNA processing events

```{r results='asis'}
# percentages mapped to host/parasite/total
#mapping_stats <- mapping_stats %>%
#    mutate(pct_reads_host=(num_reads_host/num_reads_total) * 100,

dat <- mapping_stats %>% 
    group_by(Stage=condition) %>% 
    summarize(
        'Parasite reads'=sum(num_reads_parasite),
        'Number of parasite reads containing SL'=sum(num_reads_sl),
        '% parasite reads containing SL'=(sum(num_reads_sl) / sum(num_reads_parasite)) * 100
    )

# reorder by development stage
dat <- dat[match(CONFIG$condition_order, dat$Stage),]

xkable(dat, caption='**Table S2 (A)** SL-containing reads')
```
